```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(RCurl)
#Load Data for custodian_deaths.csv for the state of Texas, USA
url <- getURL("http://texasjusticeinitiative.org/wp-content/themes/tji/api/v1/download.php?page=&", ssl.verifyhost=FALSE, ssl.verifypeer=FALSE)
class(url)
tx <- read.csv2(textConnection(url), header = TRUE,sep=",")
age <- as.numeric(tx$Age)

```
